titleStmt.title: An easie and familiar method whereby to iudge the effects depending on eclipses, either of the sun or moon. By William Lilly student in astrologie
titleStmt.author: Lilly, William, 1602-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the Company of Stationers, and H. Blunden, at the Castle in Corn-Hill,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "march 22. 1651"; also the last number of the date has been marked through.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
